{"step_by_step_thinking": "The MB2 canal in the maxillary first molar is not always visible, even with the use of a dental operating microscope. The visibility of the MB2 canal can vary greatly depending on the individual's anatomy. However, studies have shown that with the use of a dental operating microscope, the MB2 canal can be identified in approximately 70-85% of cases.", "answer_choice": "B"}
